subject: Add interactive price history chart to FundDetailPage
body:
- Create PriceChart component with SVG-based line chart (no dependencies)
- Time range filters: 1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y, ALL
- Hover tooltip showing price and date
- Color-coded: green for gains, red for losses
- Percentage change indicator for selected period
- Add translation keys for chart loading states

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add interactive price history chart to FundDetailPage
